response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and benefits, I understand its worth to you is estimated at $10,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the potential for a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 9500}
